fullText: Christine Ebersole delivers a tour de force performance in dual roles as both mother and daughter in this haunting musical adaptation of the Maysles brothers' documentary.
dtliExcerpt: Christine Ebersole delivers a tour de force performance in dual roles as both mother and daughter in this haunting musical adaptation of the Maysles brothers' documentary.
